org.apache.tvm

Class NDArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tvm.TVMValue
      • org.apache.tvm.NDArrayBase

  • public class NDArray
extends NDArrayBase
    Lightweight NDArray class of TVM runtime.
